The tidyverse repository contains a collection of R packages that are designed to work together seamlessly, providing a consistent and intuitive interface for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization. The tidyverse package serves as a convenient entry point, installing and loading the core packages: ggplot2, dplyr, tidyr, readr, purrr, tibble, stringr, forcats, and lubridate. This repository also includes a selection of other packages that are frequently used, such as hms, feather, haven, httr, jsonlite, readxl, rvest, xml2, modelr, and broom.
